intent_atoms.description: Provide UIDocumentPicker integration for iOS/iPadOS once UIKit adapters are introduced.
The FilesystemAccessKit PRD success criteria must be satisfied by the UIKit adapter.

functional_units.name: UIDocumentPicker integration
functional_units.description: Provides a UIKit-backed presenter that surfaces UIDocumentPickerViewController for open/save flows and bridges completions via continuations.

functional_units.name: FilesystemDocumentPickerPresenter
functional_units.description: A class that presents UIDocumentPickerViewController and handles completion callbacks.

functional_units.name: UIKit presenter factory selection
functional_units.description: Logic in FilesystemAccess.live to select the UIKit presenter on iOS/iPadOS, retain AppKit behavior on macOS, and allow tests to inject custom presenters.

functional_units.name: FilesystemAccess live adapter
functional_units.description: Runtime component that chooses appropriate document picker presenter based on platform and test injections.

functional_units.name: FilesystemAccessTests for presenter injection
functional_units.description: Unit tests verifying that the live adapter consumes an injected presenter when AppKit is unavailable, ensuring CI coverage.
